title: Toss traditional salads aside with this delicious pasta and chicken recipe
content: Chicken Caesar Pasta Salad   Salad   2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves   1/2 lb (225 g) farfalle   1 head romaine lettuce, thinly sliced   8 slices bacon, cooked and broken into pieces   1/2 cup (35 g) grated Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese   Ma
